review: I'm so pleased with my Fire TV that I bought two.  One for each TV.  I've saved over $1,100 on my cable bill per year.  I don't have a cable bill and still enjoy the latest TV shows and movies. It's very easy to operate.  I'm an older person trying to jeep up with the lastest.  I really enjoy my Amazon Fire TV.  Stephanie G

review: I am pleased with fire TV. I have a smart TV but it seems to have problems loading of late. I believe it's a slow Internet connection problem in a rural setting . But using fire TV as a buffer seems to help.The one thing I question is the fact that it doesn't seem to turn off. I understand there is supposed to be 30 minutes Before it goes to sleep but the light stays on from one day to the next. It is nice to be able to use vocal instructions andit is easy to connect with a program I'm in the middle of watching. I have connected to sling TV and Hulu and no longer subscribe to satellite service. :)
